components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: Hi all,since apple doesn't support any other mechanism other than IAP for the in app purchases i want to know the mechanism  of integrating the  in app purchases the store-kit that is available at the marketplace has 2/5 rating so i am kind of reluctant to get started with it,any type of help is highly appreciated.looking forward to hearing from you sooner.i have already wasted two working days in my analysis please help me here.Best!

comments.body: Hello, I can't understand why you don't want to use store-kit module for iOS in app purchases. It got great review in the marketplace. There are currently no other module for iOS in app purchases. [StoreKit In-App Purchasing (iOS)|https://marketplace.appcelerator.com/apps/7161?restoreSearch=true#!overview] by Logical Labs is the best there is. Or else you need to develop your own module. Hope this helps, Thanks.
